item.title: Chance encounters
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description:
Came across this ‘freshly’ made trail in Skyline Park yesterday. I’ve been to this small park quite a few times but never quite spotted this ’extension’. Should get back here sometime soon to explore further!

Yet another find off the blue that makes me love Boston all the more!

Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: The Deadly Grizzly Bear Attacks That Changed the National Park Service Forever
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description:
Adding Night of the Grizzlies to my reading list!

Just read: The Deadly Grizzly Bear Attacks That Changed the National Park Service Forever

Glacier National Park’s busiest season came to an abrupt halt in the summer of 1967. In a matter of hours, two grizzly bears had acted as they never had before in the park’s 57-year history. Several miles apart, each bear had mauled a young woman on the same day, in the dark, early hours of August 13.

Srikanth Perinkulam
